pull.title: ci: Fix macOS brew install command
pull.body:
A solution for https://bintray.com shutdown.

Details: https://github.com/Homebrew/discussions/discussions/691.

events.body:
Looks like it runs into a different issue after this:
```
checking for Qt5Core >= 5.9.5... no
configure: error: Qt5Core >= 5.9.5 not found
This file contains any messages produced by compilers while
running configure, to aid debugging if configure makes a mistake.
```

ci: Fix macOS brew install command

events.body:
@laanwj 

> Looks like it runs into a different issue after this:
> 
> ```
> checking for Qt5Core >= 5.9.5... no
> configure: error: Qt5Core >= 5.9.5 not found
> This file contains any messages produced by compilers while
> running configure, to aid debugging if configure makes a mistake.
> ```

Thanks! Fixed.
